content: lion brand pattern # chs-watr skill level beginner + level 2 790-329 homespun yarn waterfall 6 balls crochet hook - size q-19 **15 75 mm** gauge 6 stitches = 5 inches using two strands of yarn held together pattern 1-row repeat entire throw is worked lengthwise with two strands of yarn held together see waterfall throw knit 1 for the knit version *free registration at site required to access pattern * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/waterfall-throw-knit
